summary: Small WIP retexture of the Blades Armor
descriptionHtml:
I really like the Blades armor but, I don't like how it's heavily Oriental. Not that it's bad or anything but it's hard to really use it with other armor assets because of this. So for my own personal taste I retextured some of it. The thigh cloth became black chainmail, the blue legs and arm cloth now match using a new cloth texture in blue, and the groin and rear plate, as well as some side plates now match the upper armor.

To come:
This is MALE ONLY at the moment. I plan to make a female version next. For now it's just the cuirass (chest piece) but I plan to work on the boots, gloves, helmet, and shield next.


Installation:
Pretty much the same as anything else that's a retexture.. Drop it into Data..
author: Kel
